bibl.seg: PEARCE Sarah, The Land of the Body. Studies in Philo's Representation of Egypt. (Wissenschaftliche Untersuchungen zum Neuen Testament. 208.)
Tübingen, Mohr Siebeck, 2007, 8°, xxviii-365 pp. ISBN 978-3-16-149250-1. €109.

Introduction. - 1. Philo's Contexts. - 2. Egyptians in Philo's World. - 3. Egypt, Land of the Body. - 4. Egyptians as Symbols. - 5. Wicked Hosts and Perfect Guests. - 6. Egyptian Atheism: Philo on the Nile. - 7. Animal Worship in Philo's World. - 8. Philo on Egyptian Animal Worship. - Bibliography. Index.
C.R. par Frederick E. Brenk, JEA 94 (2008) pp. 340-342.
